EmailTemplate.name: PS GSL1 PRM-Request Add Update New Partner Account in NAM
EmailTemplate.subject: PRM-Request Add Update New Partner Account in NAM : {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.PS_Escalated_To_Name__c},
Please process the following Partner-related request based on the details below:
PRM-Request to Add / Update New Partner Account in NAM
Support Portal Partner Request to check if a Partner Account exists in NAM
(IF NO - Create New in NAM; IF YES- Update Details on NAM)
Organization Name
ALCR ID / 1*
SAP ID / 2*
Account ID / 3*
Street Address
City
State
Postal Code
Country
{!Case.Country__c}
Company Contact email
Company Email Domain
Enable Automatic Approval
Company Phone Number
Organization type
Company Type
Auto update
Additional Notes
Once completed, please revert with the confirmation.
If additional information is needed, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at partner.support@nokia.com.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Partner Support Desk Email: partner.support@nokia.com
Partner Portal
Copyright 2020 Nokia
Thread Id: {{!Case.Thread_Id}}
